DESCRIPTION: Determines the greater of two numbers.
EXAMPLE: <h3>Max Example</h3> <cfif IsDefined("FORM.myNum1")> <cfif IsNumeric(FORM.myNum1) and IsNumeric(FORM.myNum2)> <p>The maximum of the two numbers is <cfoutput>#Max(FORM.myNum1, FORM.myNum2)#</cfoutput> <p>The minimum of the two numbers is <cfoutput>#Min(FORM.myNum1, FORM.myNum2)#</cfoutput> <cfelse> <p>Please enter two numbers </cfif> </cfif> <form action = "max.cfm"> <h3>Enter two numbers, see the maximum and minimum of them</h3> Number 1 <input type = "Text" name = "MyNum1"> <br>Number 2 <input type = "Text" name = "MyNum2"> <br><input type = "Submit" name = "" value = "See results"> </form>
